creator: cristian.baica@softvision.ro
summary: Microphone settings can't be modified when using Jitsi meeting

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Created attachment 8985320
Microphone settings can't be modified

[Affected versions]:
- Fx 60.0.2
- Fx 61.0b13
- Fx 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- Windows 10 x64
- Ubuntu 16.04 x64
- Windows 7 x64
- macOS 10.13

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Launch Firefox.
2. Go to https://meet.jit.si/ and join or create a new meeting.
3. Open the meeting settings (bottom right side of the screen).
4. Click the 'Device Settings' option.
5. Try to open the 'Microphone' drop-down.

[Expected result]:
- The menu should open and display all the available microphone inputs.

[Actual result]:
- The drop-down doesn't open.

[Regression range]:
- This does not look like a regression since I could reproduce the issue using Fx 34.0a1.

[Additional notes]:
- This issue does not occur on Chrome.
comments.author: cristian.baica@softvision.ro
